none.description: perfect recognised transcript or non-issues (e.g. comma placement, differences in hyphens, additional words due to stutter or disfluency)

minor.description: something a viewer would easily be able to read through (e.g. incorrect capitalisation, spacing, pronouns/prepositions, omission of secondary detail

standard.description: disrupts the flow, affects a viewer's comprehension (e.g. misrecognised/omitted names, homophones/sound-alikes, omission of primary detail)

serious.description: misinformation - errors which read logically but changes the text's meaning, giving the viewer a false impression (e.g. alternative names/numbers, incorrect word endings/contractions, omission causing misinformation)
